response.overview: Originally released in 1981, Camel's concept album "Nude" tells the poignant story of a Japanese soldier stranded on a Pacific island, unaware that World War II has ended. The 2023 remastered edition features a newly remastered original stereo mix by Ben Wiseman, along with new stereo and 5.1 surround sound mixes crafted by Stephen W. Tayler. This expanded release offers enhanced audio clarity and depth, bringing renewed life to the album's intricate compositions. The edition also includes an illustrated booklet with an essay, providing deeper insight into this progressive rock masterpiece.
response.title: Camel - Nude (2023 Remaster)
